TEXT.TITLE: SHIRMAX FASHIONS LTD <SHX.M> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: qtr ended May 2 Oper shr three cts vs 11 cts Oper net 333,000 vs 885,000 Revs 14.9 mln vs 12.2 mln Note: Latest qtr exludes writeoff of 735,000 dlrs from store renovation. Reuter
